#labels Phase-Deploy,Featured
*Installation instructions for Linux tarball
assuming you have make tools and libgtk2.0-0 (>= 2.18.0) installed. if you're using Ubuntu... all of the required packages are in the Jaunty repos*

_required packages_
 * mono-runtime
 * mono-devel
 * libnotify0.4-cil
 * libglade2.0-cil

_Download and install XBMControl Evo_
{{{
~ wget http://xbmcontrol-evo.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/xbmcontrol-evo-0.1/Packages/xbmcontrol-evo-0.1.8.tar.gz
~ tar xzf xbmcontrol-evo-0.1.8.tar.gz
~ cd xbmcontrol-evo-0.1
~ ./configure
~ make
~ sudo make install
}}}
